ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: I think Jaggedpine is actually attached to surefall glade. so if you are kos in surefall you need to be careful. Also, even with a good graphics card it can be
ygData.messageBody:
I think Jaggedpine is actually attached to surefall glade. so if you are kos
in surefall you need to be careful. Also, even with a good graphics card it
can be fairly laggy there because of the type of graphics. I hear there are
some cool things that drop there though. Eye of the Griffon drops there.
It's +10 wisdom but -20 charisma, range slot item.
luv,
-Su

try jagged pine......its between blackburrow and shurfall glen
----- Original Message -----
From: Masteradept
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, October 11, 2003 11:48 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting 46-50


Ok I'm asking the question....I'm a 46 druid...and I'm wondering
where you guys would solo at this point. I was doing the kiting in
GD on FG's..no I don't want to do the dwarf kiting.

SvC
